input.sentences: we go to an island for the first time
we get to see this old housse .
then we go to the other place .
then we go the villages to see what is there .
finally we get a cup of coffee .
output.sentences: I just went to for a stroll around an island.
I came across this girl standing outside of her house.
The village looked very poor from the outside.
However, the village was filled with palm trees.
Once inside, we were offered tea.
